TEXT.English: Terrible substance that makes venomous anything it contacts.
TEXT.French: Terrible substance that makes venomous anything it contacts.
TEXT.German: Schreckliche Substanz, die alles vergiftet, was sie berührt.
TEXT.Italian: Terrible substance that makes venomous anything it contacts.
TEXT.Spanish: Terrible substance that makes venomous anything it contacts.

TEXT.English: Your unit finds some mountaineering gear among skeletons under a pile of rocks.
TEXT.French: Your unit finds some mountaineering gear among skeletons under a pile of rocks.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit findet eine Bergausrüstung bei einem Haufen Skeletten unter einem Felsen.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit finds some mountaineering gear among skeletons under a pile of rocks.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit finds some mountaineering gear among skeletons under a pile of rocks.

TEXT.English: Your unit finds a supply of well-made gear among some dessicated corpses.
TEXT.French: Your unit finds a supply of well-made gear among some dessicated corpses.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit findet einen Vorrat gut gemachter Ausrüstung zwischen ausgetrockneten Körpern.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit finds a supply of well-made gear among some dessicated corpses.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit finds a supply of well-made gear among some dessicated corpses.

TEXT.English: Your unit finds treasure! It's an assortment of practical clothing and tools such as oiled cloaks and camp cooking gear!
TEXT.French: Your unit finds treasure! It's an assortment of practical clothing and tools such as oiled cloaks and camp cooking gear!
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit entdeckt einen Schatz! Es handelt sich um eine Ansammlung von praktischen Kleidern wie z.B. geölten Umhängen und einer Kochausrüstung!
TEXT.Italian: Your unit finds treasure! It's an assortment of practical clothing and tools such as oiled cloaks and camp cooking gear!
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit finds treasure! It's an assortment of practical clothing and tools such as oiled cloaks and camp cooking gear!

TEXT.English: Your unit stumbles into a varity of traps, but eventually frees itself. The traps are in good enough condition to take with you. Except for the pit traps.
TEXT.French: Your unit stumbles into a varity of traps, but eventually frees itself. The traps are in good enough condition to take with you. Except for the pit traps.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit stolpert in eine Vielzahl von Fallen, kann sich aber stets selbst befreien. Die Fallen sind in ausreichend gutem Zustand, um sie mitzunehmen. Bis auf die Fallgruben.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit stumbles into a varity of traps, but eventually frees itself. The traps are in good enough condition to take with you. Except for the pit traps.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit stumbles into a varity of traps, but eventually frees itself. The traps are in good enough condition to take with you. Except for the pit traps.

TEXT.English: Your unit doesn't know what it was that they killed, but it had excellent fur. Thick and warm.
TEXT.French: Votre unité ne sait pas ce qu'elle a tué, mais sa fourrure est excellente : épaisse et chaude.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit hat keine Ahnung, wen oder was sie getötet hat - es verfügt jedenfalls über ein hervorragendes Fell. Schön dick und warm.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit doesn't know what it was that they killed, but it had excellent fur. Thick and warm.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit doesn't know what it was that they killed, but it had excellent fur. Thick and warm.

TEXT.English: An poorly-hidden cache yields, among other useful things, clothing designed to enhance it's wearer's ability to conceal himself in trees or bush.
TEXT.French: An poorly-hidden cache yields, among other useful things, clothing designed to enhance it's wearer's ability to conceal himself in trees or bush.
TEXT.German: Ein schlecht getarntes Geheimversteck. Neben andern nützlichen Dingen finden sich Kleider, die die Fähigkeit ihres Trägers verbessert, sich zwischen Bäumen oder im Dickicht zu verbergen.
TEXT.Italian: An poorly-hidden cache yields, among other useful things, clothing designed to enhance it's wearer's ability to conceal himself in trees or bush.
TEXT.Spanish: An poorly-hidden cache yields, among other useful things, clothing designed to enhance it's wearer's ability to conceal himself in trees or bush.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers a Healing Salve.
TEXT.French: Votre unité découvre un baume de soins.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers a Healing Salve.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit discovers a Healing Salve.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Jade Torc.
TEXT.French: Votre unité découvre un ancien artefact, la Torque de Jade.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit entdeckt ein uraltes Artefakt, das Jadeamulett.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Jade Torc.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Jade Torc.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers a Potion of Invisibility.
TEXT.French: Votre unité découvre une potion d'invisibilité.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers a Potion of Invisibility.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit discovers a Potion of Invisibility.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers a Potion of Restoration.
TEXT.French: Votre unité découvre une potion de restauration.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers a Potion of Restoration.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit discovers a Potion of Restoration.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Rod of Winds.
TEXT.French: Votre unité découvre un ancien artefact, the Rod of Winds.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit entdeckt ein uraltes Artefakt, das Zepter des Windes.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Rod of Winds.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Rod of Winds.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Timor Mask.
TEXT.French: Votre unité découvre un ancien artefact, le Masque de Timor
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit entdeckt ein uraltes Artefakt, die Timormaske.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Timor Mask.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Timor Mask.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers a healing potion.
TEXT.French: Your unit discovers a healing potion.
TEXT.German: Your unit discovers a healing potion.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers a healing potion.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit discovers a healing potion.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers a mana potion, the Newt's Draught.
TEXT.French: Your unit discovers a mana potion, the Newt's Draught.
TEXT.German: Your unit discovers a mana potion, the Newt's Draught.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers a mana potion, the Newt's Draught.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit discovers a mana potion, the Newt's Draught.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Heart Amulet.
TEXT.French: Votre unité découvre un ancien artefact, l'Amulette de Cœur
TEXT.German: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Heart Amulet.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Heart Amulet.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Heart Amulet.

TEXT.French: Votre unité découvre des bottes de vitesse.

TEXT.English: You find an abandoned camp. Clearly someone has been here before. Searching it all you find is a cloak.
TEXT.French: You find an abandoned camp. Clearly someone has been here before. Searching it all you find is a cloak.
TEXT.German: You find an abandoned camp. Clearly someone has been here before. Searching it all you find is a cloak.
TEXT.Italian: You find an abandoned camp. Clearly someone has been here before. Searching it all you find is a cloak.
TEXT.Spanish: You find an abandoned camp. Clearly someone has been here before. Searching it all you find is a cloak.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Ring of Perception.
TEXT.French: Votre unité découvre un artefact ancien, l'anneau de perception.
TEXT.German: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Ring of Perception.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Ring of Perception.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Ring of Perception.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Ring of Striking.
TEXT.French: Votre unité découvre un ancien artefact, the Ring of Striking.
TEXT.German: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Ring of Striking.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Ring of Striking.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Ring of Striking.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Compelling Jewel.
TEXT.French: Votre unité découvre un ancien artefact, the Compelling Jewel.
TEXT.German: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Compelling Jewel.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Compelling Jewel.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Compelling Jewel.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Cursed Token of Ragnarok
TEXT.French: Votre unité découvre un ancien artefact, the Cursed Token of Ragnarok.
TEXT.German: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Cursed Token of Ragnarok.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Cursed Token of Ragnarok.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Cursed Token of Ragnarok.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Menacing Helm.
TEXT.French: Votre unité découvre un ancien artefact, the Menacing Helm.
TEXT.German: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Menacing Helm.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Menacing Helm.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Menacing Helm.

TEXT.English: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Hauberk of Abjuration.
TEXT.French: Votre unité découvre un ancien artefact, le Haubert d'Abjuration.
TEXT.German: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Hauberk of Abjuration.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Hauberk of Abjuration.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit discovers an ancient artifact, the Hauberk of Abjuration.
